long_description: The Wheel-On is loaded with features to ensure your wheel travels safely to your destination and is easy to remove when you arrive. Built-in wheel security features a zero adjustment anti-spin device; no more loose straps! Fast wheel loading and unloading with easy drop-in fork design. Aluminum styling complements all of Thule's fork- mount bike carriers. Fork folds down flat when not in use.
short_description: The Wheel-On is loaded with features to ensure your wheel travels safely to your destination and is easy to remove when you arrive.
